question: What is the official currency of Denmark?
explanation: Danish Krone is the official currency of Denmark and its autonomous territories of the Faroe Islands and Greenland. It is issued by the Danmarks Nationalbank. Euro is the official currency of 19 of the 27 member states of the European Union. Swedish Krona is the official currency of Sweden. Norwegian Krone is the official currency of Norway. Polish Zloty is the official currency of Poland.
